title: Column icons don't show up in connecting derby database
OB: When expanding the Data Source in the Availaible Items sector by clicking the related icon, the column icons do not appear.
EB: Upon expanding the Data Source in the Availaible Items sector by clicking the related icon, both table icons and column icons should appear.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the Availaible Items sector.
2. Find the Data Source icon and click on it to expand.
3. Observe if the table icons and column icons appear.
